item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Virginia Satir
item.description: "I am Me. In all the world, there is no one else exactly like me. Everything that comes out of me is authentically mine, because I alone chose it -- I own everything about me: my body, my feelings, my mouth, my voice, all my actions, whether they be to others or myself. I own my fantasies, my dreams, my hopes, my fears. I own my triumphs and successes, all my failures and mistakes. Because I own all of me, I can become intimately acquainted with me. By so doing, I can love me and be friendly with all my parts. I know there are aspects about myself that puzzle me, and other aspects that I do not know -- but as long as I am friendly and loving to myself, I can courageously and hopefully look for solutions to the puzzles and ways to find out more about me. However I look and sound, whatever I say and do, and whatever I think and feel at a given moment in time is authentically me. If later some parts of how I looked, sounded, thought, and felt turn out to be unfitting, I can discard that which is unfitting, keep the rest, and invent something new for that which I discarded. I can see, hear, feel, think, say, and do. I have the tools to survive, to be close to others, to be productive, and to make sense and order out of the world of people and things outside of me. I own me, and therefore, I can engineer me. I am me, and I am Okay." -- Virginia Satir

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Melanie Rawn
item.description: "Affection isn't so plentiful in this life that any of us can afford to reject it when it's offered, whatever its source." -- Melanie Rawn

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "If it means something, take it to heart. If it means nothing, it's nothing. Let it go." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "When the day shall come that we do part," he said softly, and turned to look at me, "if my last words are not 'I love you'-ye'll ken it was because I didna have time." -- Diana Gabaldon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by David Eddings
Suzanne add a quote by Julie Kenner
item.description: "I love it when my justifications for avoiding housework are actually legitimate. " -- Julie Kenner

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Tad Williams
item.description: "We are none of us promised anything but the last breath we take." -- Tad Williams

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Madeleine Brent
item.description: "When You don't know what to do, just do whatever comes next and go from there." -- Madeleine Brent

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Karen Marie Moning
item.description: "I love books, by the way, way more than movies. Movies tell you what to think. A good book lets you choose a few thoughts for yourself. Movies show you the pink house. A good book tells you there's a pink house and lets you paint some of the finishing touches, maybe choose the roof style,park your own car out front. My imagination has always topped anything a movie could come up with. Case in point, those darned Harry Potter movies. That was so not what that part-Veela-chick, Fleur Delacour, looked like." -- Karen Marie Moning

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Juliet Marillier
item.description: "I like the truth, even when it does trouble me." -- Juliet Marillier

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "but for my own part, if a book is well written, I always find it too short." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I may have lost my heart, but not my self-control. " -- Jane Austen

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Humor keeps us alive. Humor and food. Don't forget food. You can go a week without laughing." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "There’s a fine line between support and stalking and let’s all stay on the right side of that." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Recognizing power in another does not diminish your own." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon
item.description: "Wash: This landing is gonna get pretty interesting. Mal: Define "interesting". Wash: "Oh God, oh God, we're all going to die"? Mal [on speakerphone]: This is the captain: we have a little problem with our entry sequence so we may experience some slight turbulence, then explode." -- Mutant Enemy/Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "The thing about a hero, is even when it doesn't look like there's a light at the end of the tunnel, he's going to keep digging, he's going to keep trying to do right and make up for what's gone before, just because that's who he is." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Mal: Doctor, I'm taking your sister under my protection. If any thing happens to her, anything at all, I swear to you I will get very choked up. Honestly, there could be tears." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Loneliness is about the scariest thing out there." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by James A. Owen
item.description: "Our weaknesses are always evident, both to ourselves and others. But our strengths are hidden until we choose to reveal them--and that is when we are truly tested. When all that we have within is exposed, and we may no longer blame our inadequacies for our failure, but must instead depend upon our strengths to succeed ... that is when the measure of a man is taken, my boy." -- James A. Owen

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by James A. Owen
item.description: "Interesting doesn't always equal practical, but being practical is always less interesting." -- James A. Owen

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by James A. Owen
item.description: "Power, true power, comes from the belief in true things, and the willingness to stand behind that belief, even if the universe itself conspires to thwart your plans. Chaos may settle; flames may die; worlds may rise and fall. But true things will remain so, and will never fail to guide you to your goals." -- James A. Owen

item.title: Suzanne add a quote by James A. Owen
item.description: "Discipline, Norah. If you're going to taunt them, remember to stick out your tongue." -- James A. Owen
